snippet.title: Enshrouded - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer
snippet.description:
Get a deep dive into the survival and exploration gameplay elements of Enshrouded in this latest trailer for the upcoming action RPG. Check it out to see the world of Enshrouded and how to survive against wildlife, enemies, and more through resource gathering, and crafting essential items like weapons and shields. The trailer also gives a peek at quests, combat, and navigating The Shroud as you explore the world of Embervale.

Enshrouded is headed to Steam Early Access in 2023.

#IGN #Gaming #Enshrouded
